title: Caffeine
subtitle: Strategic doses throughout the day
infoContent: Caffeine has a half-life of 5-6 hours in the body. Consuming after 3 PM can interfere with sleep. The ideal time for the first dose is 90-120 minutes after waking, when natural cortisol begins to decline.
wakeTimeLabel: What time do you wake up?

items.timing: **Timing is everything**: Avoid caffeine in the first 90min after waking
items.cutoff: **Cut at 3 PM**: The 5-6h half-life can disrupt your sleep
items.hydration: **Stay hydrated**: Drink water between caffeine doses
items.tolerance: **Tolerance**: Take periodic breaks to maintain effectiveness
